upload.androPyTool.description: AndroPyTool is a tool for extracting static and dynamic features from Android APKs. It combines different well-known Android apps analysis tools such as DroidBox, FlowDroid, Strace, AndroGuard or VirusTotal analysis.
upload.androPyTool.more: On the next field you can upload your own apk to get it analyzed or search already analyzed applications by hash.
upload.label: Drag and drop or click here to upload a file
upload.you.have.to.wait.sorry: This process can take a few minutes. When finished you will be automatically redirected to the report.
upload.only.one.file: Only one file can be uploaded
upload.virusTotal.hint: The default API key used is limited to 4 requests per minute. You can use your own API key as explained on

report.title: Report
report.download.apk.tooltip: You can't download an application if you haven't logged in
report.error.404: The is no generated report of the application with sha256
report.error.invalid: The analyzed application is not a valid apk
report.error.corrupt: The application is currently being analyzed
